Self.Wiki: This map object represents an in-game entity, used for enemies, characters and interaction points that make use of the Talk system.

NpcThinkParamId.Wiki: The AI parameters this character should use.

NpcParamId.Wiki: The property parameters this character should use.

TalkID.Wiki: The ID of a talk ESD used by the character.

CharaInitParamId.Wiki: The ID in CharaInitParam determining equipment and stats for humans.

HitPartName.Wiki: The collision that controls loading of the enemy.

PatrolRouteName.Wiki: The walk route this enemy follows.

ChrActivateCondParamID.Wiki: The ID in ChrActivateConditionParam that affects enemy appearance conditions.

UnkSpEffectSetParamID.Wiki: looks like condemned SpeffectSetParamID.Used in m30.

CondemnedSpEffectSetParamID.Wiki: A set of SpEffects applied when the region is condemned.

BackupEventAnimID.Wiki: The animation ID for this enemy to idle with.

SpEffectSetParamIds.Wiki: A set of SpEffects that are applied to this enemy.
